meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be used again.
meanings.sent1: The reusability of the plastic containers made them eco-friendly.
meanings.sent2: The reusability of the shopping bags helped reduce waste.
meanings.sent3: The reusability of the joke made everyone laugh again.
meanings.sent4: The reusability of the password was like having a key that never lost its shape.
meanings.sent5: The reusability of the cloth napkins saved money and trees.

meanings.definition: The act of using something again.
meanings.sent1: The reusability of the software allowed for cost-effective updates.
meanings.sent2: The reusability of the tools in the workshop saved time and resources.
meanings.sent3: The reusability of the dance moves made the performance more entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The reusability of the ideas sparked a wave of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The reusability of the ingredients in the recipe made cooking simpler.
